  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors 
    Constructor Description
    Shader​(java.lang.String shaderName)
    Loads Or References a shader in the private context, which means where ever this shader was created thats were it will be usable since the context handle for this is 0.
    Shader​(java.lang.String shaderName, long context)
    Creates a shader found in the shader assets directory.

  • Constructor Details

    • Shader

      public Shader​(java.lang.String shaderName)
      Loads Or References a shader in the private context, which means where ever this shader was created thats were it will be usable since the context handle for this is 0. This shader cannot be used universally.
      Parameters:
      shaderName -
